column1: Smoque BBQ////After hearing from many people that Smoque has amazing bbq
column2: we finally decided to try it. I should have paid more attention to the bad reviews on Yelp. It's not that anything was bad
column4: but the food was really not worth the hour wait and the rushed dining experience. We got the side salad
column11: and corn bread). I have to say that the side salad was both huge and delicious. I also liked the Texas sausage and the mac and cheese and corn bread. But neither of the other two main dishes had much flavor and I've definitely had better elsewhere. I also thought it was crazy that the restaurant was out of St. Louis ribs by 8:00 p.m. on a Saturday. I dd think the staff was great
column12: but that's not enough for me to come back.
